Uses of Package
jam.plot

Packages that use jam.plot
jam Root package for the Jam software package. 
jam.fit Contains classes for parametric fitting of 1-dimensional histograms. 
jam.plot Classes for controlling the representation of the plots portion of Jam's display. 
 

Classes in jam.plot used by jam
Display
          This class is a display routine for plots.
 

Classes in jam.plot used by jam.fit
Display
          This class is a display routine for plots.
PlotMouseListener
          Interface that you must implement if you want to get mouse click data point.
 

Classes in jam.plot used by jam.plot
Display
          This class is a display routine for plots.
Display.Preferences
          for preference black background
Displayable
          Interface for a object that can be displayed
Limits
          Stores the parameters on how the histograms are to be displayed.
Plot
          Abstract class for displayed plots.
PlotMouse
          Converts screen pixel to data value for a mouse Click.
PlotMouseListener
          Interface that you must implement if you want to get mouse click data point.
